arts.ttl: Sargent strikes late for Norwich to sink WBA
arts.sum: Josh Sargent’s stoppage-time goal earned Norwich a 1-0 win at Carrow Road which kept alive their outside hopes of reaching the Championship play-offs – and put a big dent in West Brom’s promotion dream.

arts.ttl: West Brom man offered contract – Agents working to reach summer agreement
arts.sum: West Bromwich Albion winger Grady Diangana has been offered a contract by Turkish side Istanbul Basaksehir ahead of becoming a free agent in the summer. That’s according to Africa Foot, who say the Super Lig side have already sent his representatives a three-year contract.
